name: notesalad
description: Device-independent MIDI implementation and software synthesizer

scripts.build-common: mkdir -p dist && npm run build-wasm && node_modules/.bin/webpack --config worklet.webpack.config.js && cp src/index.js dist/
scripts.build-wasm: unset NODE && mkdir -p build/wasm && cd build/wasm && emcmake cmake -DWASM=1 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=$CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE ../../.. && emmake make -j 8

author: Dan Fry
